subject: Re: Fw: Your Total Contacts order has now shipped

full_threads.body:
Hi Elise,

Thanks for confirming.

We have adjusted the cart page that allows a user to order qty.

Pop-up: confirming this is all on the products, Popup will be trigger when "Power (R)" has been change.

Teco PX has been removed :)

Hi Joel,

Re-order: Is it possible to be able to have that customisable, so that customer can adjust quantities?

Pop-up: Yes please, that is the pop-up I was referring to. Is it possible to have that come up for all products?

Teco Px: The only time it comes up now is for re-orders, when customer had been able to tick that box as part of the ordering process. I thought it was removed completely just before Christmas last year (2024) when we had a breach on our site and bots were able to get around that hidden code to test card numbers? There was an alternative security wall put in place, I thought, that was less common. It might be best to remove it completely, as the customer who used it yesterday has never ordered from us before and is not a Total Eyecare patient.

Kind regards,

Elise


​http://www.totalcontacts.com.au/

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts

Hi Elise,

I hope are doing well and thanks for the additional information.

Regarding the reorder and add quantity, at the moment, custom was put in place to only sold every item and its variation individually.

Regarding the popup: Is this what your looking for?

Regarding Teco PX
Can you please confirm, do we need to completely remove the "teco px"? If not, can you give us a little information on what needs to be in the order for the teco px to show up?

Hi Joel,

Thanks for your reply.

If you could, that would be great!
I've had another order come through this morning that's been tagged as Teco Px, but they've never purchased form us before and are not on our patient database:

Kind regards,

Elise


​http://www.totalcontacts.com.au/

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts

Hi Elise,

I hope all is well.

We are looking into this and will update you shortly.
This ticket has been waiting for over 24 hours.

Hi again,

Further to this email, the order for this customer (35126) has come up flagged as "I am a TECO px, You have my prescription", which is not the case.
This person has ordered from us twice before (Nov 2024, then March 2025), both times he input the script himself.
Can you please look into how he was able to make that selection, as it has been unavailable as an option since before he made his first order (or thereabouts)?

Kind regards,

Elise


​http://www.totalcontacts.com.au/

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Morning!

We've had this query/report overnight, about not being able to adjust quantity of a re-order.
Is this something that can be done?

ALSO, I've been meaning to ask if we could have the pop-up note about double checking whether a script is a plus or minus applicable to all products on the site. We've had an increase of errors by users and discovered that the pop-up doesn't appear for all products.

Kind regards,


Elise



​www.totalcontacts.com.au

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts


From: Andrew Wei <Andrew.Wei@petermac.org>
Sent: Monday, 26 May 2025 9:09 PM
To: Total Contacts <info@totalcontacts.com.au>
Subject: Re: Your Total Contacts order has now shipped

Do you realise that your website does not allow us to change the reorder quantity?

Regards, Andrew
